dmca.title: Google Receives Complaint Re: Hawking Infringing Software

[private]						[private]
							Chicago, Illinois 60640
							Telephone: [private]
							Facsimile: [private]

To Whom It May Concern:
    
This letter is intended as notification of advertisements in search results at google.com that constitute copyright infringement.
    
1) The copyrighted materials are owned by [private].

2) The advertisements can be found by executing a search at 
google.com. The results areas are as follows:

search term:   "Drummond Geometry"

3)You can contact me at [private], or at [private].

4)The contact information for the group pirating my software constantly changes and is listed at each advertisement, though I believe that you can usually find 
them at [private].

5)I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted 
materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright 
owner, its agent, or the law.

6)I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of 
the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
    
Sincerely,
    
[private]
[private]
